title: Shadowrealm: The Twilight War Book III
reviewText: Great series I thoroughly enjoyed it, worth a read for any Forgotten Realms fan!
description: ['Paul S. Kemp is a lawyer who lives in Michigan with his wife and twin sons.', '', '']

title: Realms Of War (Forgotten Realms Anthology)
reviewText: Pretty good, nice read and does a pretty good as a supplement for other books to flesh out character's from the Forgotten realms series of books.

title: The Adversary: The Sundering, Book III (Forgotten Realms: the Sundering)
description: ['ERIN M. EVANS got a degree in Anthropology from Washington University in St. Louis--and promptly stuck it in a box. Nowadays she uses that knowledge of bones, mythology, and social constructions to flesh out fantasy worlds. She is the author of The God Catcher, and she lives in Washington State.', '', '']

title: Night of the Hunter: Companions Codex, I
description: ["R.A. Salvatore is the New York Times best-selling author of more than forty novels, including the popular Forgotten Realms series The Legend of Drizzt. He's an avid gamer, father of three, and loyal citizen of Red Sox Nation."]

title: Shadowstorm (Forgotten Realms: The Twilight War, Book 2)
description: ['PAUL S. KEMP is a lawyer who lives in Michigan with his wife and twin sons.', '', '']

title: Shadowbred (The Twilight War, Book 1)
reviewText: Great series! must read for fans!
